title: build: dashboard gopher icon needs resizing
body:
Go 1.7.1 brings a larger favicon.

The build dashboard hotlinks https://golang.org/favicon.ico and will need to resize it or use a different image.

![screen shot 2016-09-07 at 2 23 23 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/24982/18329012/82e3edc0-7506-11e6-97ca-7f2bf84997fb.png)

/cc @bradfitz
